mods.abstract: Two color half sheet (red and black on white) announcing Century II Promotions festival with Willie Wynn and the Tennesseans, Thrasher Brothers, Wendy Bagwell and Sunliters, Sego Brothers and Naomi, the Kingsmen, Jerry and the Singing Goffs, the Telestials, and the Happy Goodman Family. Poster features metal photoplates of Willie Wynn and the Tennesseans, Thrasher Brothers, Wendy Bagwell and Sunliters, Sego Brothers and Naomi, the Kingsmen, Jerry and the Singing Goffs, and the Happy Goodman Family. Poster was ordered by Century II Promotions (purchase order 18397). To view the paperwork associated with this poster, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/20577.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
